% STYLES
\newcommand{\mktsStyleTitleChapter}{%
\Huge%
\mktsFontfileUbuntub%
\protect\renewcommand{\cn}[1]{{\adjustCjkIdeograph{\mktsFontfileCwtexqheibold{}##1}}}%%
}
\newcommand{\mktsStyleTitleSection}{%
\mktsFontfileUbuntub%
\protect\renewcommand{\cn}[1]{{\adjustCjkIdeograph{\mktsFontfileCwtexqheibold{}##1}}}%%
}
